channel.title: General on devplayer55221
channel.description: Recent content in General on devplayer55221

item.title: Writing a Burp Extension to Bypass Checksum
item.description: Wrote a burp extension that can calculate the hash value of the request and add it to the checksum header. Sometimes checksum is used to not let the proxy tools like Burp Suite to modify the request, as the checksum is calculated and checked in the backend. https://payatu.com/blog/stream-ciphers-cryptography-for-ctfs/

item.title: Decoding Digital Personal Data Protection Act For Organizations
item.description: Gone through the new Digital Personal Data Protection Act and wrote an article that could be helpful to the organziations. https://payatu.com/blog/decoding-digital-personal-data-protection-act-for-organizations

item.title: Connecting Raspberry-Pi to Laptop Without HDMI or Ethernet Cable
item.description: While doing a college project, I had to use the Raspberry-Pi for the first time and needed to connect it with the laptop without a cable. As I remember, it required some troubleshooting. https://www.instructables.com/Connecting-Raspberry-Pi-to-Laptop-Without-HDMI-or-/
